name: SpeedXiXi
description:
Low poly non realistic racing - just for fun :)

Press Q, space bar or "start button" on game pad to start :) (see bellow) 

This game is now "in developement" for fun. To see what am I able to do with Unity and Blender. Primarily I'm software developer not game designer, but I hope it is not really visible from game :)

KeyboardGame PadInfoQ or space barStart buttonadds player (currently maximum is set to 2 for splitscreen)Arrows or WSADLeft stickSpeed/turningSpace bar or numpad 0Left triggerBreakingESCWest ButtonRestartRNorth ButtonRepair and restartCSelectChange cameraZEast ButtonChange car colorXSouth ButtonChange car and restart
